v1.headline: 2X cash-collected for online service businesses through conversion systems | 100+ founders helped via Optimally | Dual Honours, Astrophysics & Maths BSc
v1.about:
Over the last 2 years, I’ve helped 50+ online service businesses systemise their marketing, scale their client acquisition, and reclaim 10+ hours per week — without hiring more team.

My mission is to help elite agency owners and consultants scale to $100k/month without bottlenecks, burnout, or relying on referrals.

I build automated client acquisition systems using AI, LinkedIn, and high-converting funnels — so founders can grow without getting stuck in the grind. And then build systems to handle those clients as they scale.

Here’s what I do:
→ I’m the founder of Optimally, where we install done-for-you AI growth systems for $10k–$50k/month agencies
→ I help founders generate 5–10+ clients per month using automated LinkedIn content, AI engagement, and proven funnels
→ I remove founders from outreach and content completely — while building their brand and pipeline on autopilot
→ I’ve worked with leaders like Liam Evans, Mark Wilson, and Kasey Jones
→ I’m building a lean 7-figure business that runs on systems, not cold DMs or churn-and-burn outreach

Who we build for:
→ Agency owners stuck relying on referrals or inconsistent outbound
→ Coaches + consultants posting content but getting no traction
→ Service businesses ready to scale without being chained to their marketing
→ Founders who want leverage, automation, and warm leads — daily
→ Operators who value precision, speed, and high-performance systems

Instagram: @reubshears
YouTube: @reubenshears
LinkedIn: You’re already here. Let’s connect.
